com.connectlife.coreserver.modules.apiserver

Class ApiServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.connectlife.coreserver.modules.apiserver.ApiServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CLApi.Iface, Module

    public class ApiServer
extends java.lang.Object
implements Module, CLApi.Iface
    Api server of the coreserver. This class is main api server interface for JSON client. This Api is a singleton class that you can instanciated only once. Use getInstance() methode to get the instance of this api.

    This api works with HTTP and JSON.

    Author:
    Eric Pinet (pineri01@gmail.com)
    2015-09-07

      • simple

        public static void simple(CLApi.Processor _processor,
                          PushDistributor _push_distributor,
                          int _port)
        Starting simple server (no secure).
        Parameters:
        _processor - Processor of the server.
        _push_distributor - Distributor that keeping list of all client connected for simple connection (no secure).
        _port - TcpIp m_port to listening.
